description:
The European Commission is facing criticism from politicians and campaigners for giving a free pass for senior oil and gas executives to attend last year’s COP28 summit in Dubai, United Arab Emirates (UAE).  The EU invited five representatives of fossil fuel giants, including executives from BP, ExxonMobil, and Eni, to the flagship climate talks in […]

The post EU Accused of Inviting Fossil Fuel Executives to COP28 Under False Pretences appeared first on DeSmog.
title: EU Accused of Inviting Fossil Fuel Executives to COP28 Under False Pretences
